game.beginning: In a world ravaged by an ancient cataclysm, humanity teeters on the brink of extinction. The last remnants of civilization are scattered across a barren wasteland, with factions vying for power and resources.
game.ending: With the secrets of the past revealed and the source of the cataclysm vanquished, the survivors must band together to forge a new future. However, as the dust settles, it becomes clear that there are those who would seek to exploit this newfound peace for their own purposes.
game.synopsis: "Echoes of Eternity" follows the journey of a young survivor named Aria, who discovers she possesses an ancient technology that holds the key to reclaiming her world. With the help of unlikely allies and against impossible odds, she must navigate treacherous landscapes, unravel mysteries of the past, and confront powerful enemies in a desperate bid for survival.
game.title: Echoes of Eternity
